Mount_Kenya.title: Mount Kenya
tips: Best time to visit: January-February or July-October
Essential gear: Warm clothing, good hiking boots
Consider acclimatization to avoid altitude sickness

Maasai_Mara.title: Maasai Mara
tips: Early morning game drives are most rewarding
Visit a Maasai village for cultural experience

Lamu_Island.title: Lamu Island
tips: No cars on the island - transportation is by donkey or boat
Dress modestly as it's a conservative Muslim community
Try Swahili dishes like biryani and samaki wa kupaka
Visit during Lamu Cultural Festival for special events

Lake_Nakuru.title: Lake Nakuru
tips: Best viewing hours are early morning
Look for rhinos in the park

Diani_Beach.title: Diani Beach
Diani_Beach.tagline: Pristine white sands of the Kenyan coast
tips: Try kitesurfing in the trade winds
Visit the nearby Shimba Hills National Reserve
Enjoy fresh seafood at beachfront restaurants
